name: Extreme Bus Driver Simulator
description:
Extreme Bus Driver Simulator is an exciting bus driving simulator set in a realistic city. The players aim to pick up all the passengers from the passenger stops and take them safely to the next stops. Backed by realistic visuals and sound effects, the game makes players feel like a real bus driver and maximizes the bus driving experience.

In the game, the countdown begins when the players arrive at the passenger stops and accept the quest. During this time, players must safely pick up passengers and deliver them to the designated stops. By completing missions on time and without errors, they can earn rewards and customize their buses with these rewards. Players can customize their buses and give them their style by changing the bus color, wheel camber, suspension, vehicle spoiler, and stickers.

Extreme Bus Driver Simulator offers the most realistic bus driving experience. Players must watch out for other vehicles in traffic while traveling in a realistic city environment. Complying with traffic rules and respecting other drivers ensures that passengers reach their destinations safely and enjoyably. Challenging traffic conditions and heavy city traffic test the driving skills of the players while at the same time increasing the adrenaline.

The gas station feature of the game further adds to the sense of realism. Players must go to the nearest gas station and fill their fuel tanks before they run out of gas. Players who gain a timing advantage by refueling before accepting missions can transport passengers more quickly and efficiently. This is one of the game's strategic aspects and affects the players' success.

The game is an attractive option for bus simulator lovers and those interested in driving games. The bus driver experience offers players a different perspective and allows them to improve their driving skills. The realistic models and detailed interiors of the buses invite players into an immersive atmosphere.

Extreme Bus Driver Simulator is an exciting and customizable bus driving simulator offering a realistic experience. The game's realistic graphics, gas station feature, and traffic system make players feel like real bus driver in the city. The task of transporting passengers safely is a challenging task that requires strategic thinking and attention. Extreme Bus Driver Simulator allows bus simulator lovers and those keen on driving games to have an enjoyable gaming experience.
